name: MAIWO NVMe Enclosure 40Gbps USB4 M.2 NVMe SSD Enclosure with Cooling Fan, All Aluminum Case Tool Free, Compatible with Thunderbolt4/3 USB3.2/3.1/3.0 8TB Capacity
short_description: 【Compatibility】This 40gbps NVMe SSD enclosure supports only 2280mm M.2 NVMe M Key SSD. Fully compatible with USB4, Thunderbolt4/3 and backward compatible with USB3.2/3.1/3.0/2.0, especially designed for Apple M1 M2 Pro/Max Mac and iPad Pro. Compatible with Windows, macOS, Linux and Android (Phone should support OTG). 【When using with Thunderbolt 3, please update your device to latest system version, and the fastest speed is 20Gbps.】

【40Gbps Transfer Speed】This 40Gbps m.2 pcie nvme ssd reader equips with ASM2464PD high -performance chipset, USB4 Type-C output interface and USB-C to USB-C 40Gbps data cable, read and write speed can reach 3200+MB/s, only takes 1 second to transfer 3G HD movie. Support UASP and TRIM when operation system of your PC is Windows 8.1 or above.
【Up to 8TB Capacity】The m.2 nvme to usb c adapter supports installing max 8TB solid state drive for storage expansion.

【Aluminium Alloy Shell】The aluminium alloy shell and built-in turbo fan makes excellent heat dissipation. This thunderbolt3/4 ssd enclosure has multiple heat dissipation methods: groove design, bilateral hollowed-out and comes with silicone thermal pad and aluminium thermal pad which can protect the the drive perfectly.
【Feature】LED Indicator / Carabiner and Braided Strap / Tool Free / Plug and Play / 4.64 x 1.96 x 0.54 inch / Support UASP TRIM S.M.A.R.T / Built-in Fan
【NOTE: If your drive is a new one, please do Hard Disk Initialization, Partition and Format to make the enclosure work. For specific steps, please see description.】

name: MAIWO M.2 NVMe SSD Enclosure 40Gbps, USB4 External Tool-Free NVMe Enclosure for 2280 M-Key,Compatible with Thunderbolt 4/3/USB4/USB C with Cooling Fan, Aluminum Alloy Shell ASM2464PD Chip
short_description: 【40Gbps NVMe Enclosure】This NVMe SSD enclosure allows you to easily transfer data from your M.2 NVMe SSD to any device with a USB Type-C port. USB4 Type-C which is compatible with Thunderbolt3/4 USB4/3.0/2.0 that can reach up to 40Gbps transfer rate, You will be impressed by how it works while allowing you to access your SSD externally and transfer data at high speeds

【Built-in Cooling Fan】The built-in fan design assists in cooling the NVMe ssd, to prevent the SSD from overheating, thereby maintaining high speeds and ensuring long-term reliability, improve long-term stability and durability of the SSD

【Broad Compatibility】The 40Gbps NVMe SSD enclosure is specially designed to support NVMe protocol M keys and for 2280 size SSDs up to 8TB. The M.2 NVMe enclosure is a multi Operating System hence compatible with Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 110, Linux, and MAC OS.(Does not support SATA NGFF SSD or mSATA SSD)

【Plug-and-Play 40gbps NVMe Enclosure】MAIWO NVMe SSD enclosure includes a simple plug-and-play installation, and no extra drivers are needed. It is a simple enclosure to use once you get the SSD drive installed, and the SSD holder ensures your drive doesn’t slip or get loose. Simply connect it to your device via the included USB cable for instant access

【Made of Aluminum Alloy】The nvme enclosure 40Gbps surface design incorporates cooling grooves which is made of Aluminum so that it has superior ability to act as a heatsink, which directly impacts performance and longevity, have a sleek, professional, premium feel and aesthetics

name: ORICO 40Gbps M.2 NVMe SSD Enclosure with Cooling Fan, Tool-Free Installation Aluminum Crystal NVMe Case, Support 2280 M2 Solid State Drive, Compatible with Thunderbolt 3/4 USB4/3.2/3.1/3.0
short_description: 【40Gbps Ultra-Fast Transfer】Supports up to 40Gbps speed via USB4, transferring 3GB files in 1 second. Tested on Thunderbolt 4 laptops, achieving 3700MB/s read and 3100MB/s write, 3x faster than common USB 3.2 enclosures

【Full-Spectrum Heat Dissipation】CNC-machined aluminum alloy body for efficient heat conduction, built-in silent cooling fan, dual-end airflow vents, plus included thermal pad and SSD heatsink—optimized cooling from both the enclosure and the SSD itself, keeping speeds stable even under heavy loads

【Performance Meets Style】Transparent PC panel reveals the SSD’s inner details, creating a distinctive tech aesthetic. The aluminum alloy body complements the look with rugged durability and functional heat management

【Push to Slide, Install in Seconds】The top cover opens with a simple push and slide motion, giving you instant access. Secure your SSD tool-free with the snap-on fastener. (Bonus thermal pad and heatsink included for better heat management)

【Wide Compatibility】Supports M-Key NVMe SSDs in sizes 2230/2242/2260/2280, with up to 8TB capacity. Compatible with USB4, Thunderbolt 3/4 host devices at speeds up to 40Gbps, and backward compatible with USB 3.2/3.1/3.0 ports up to 10Gbps (Note: SSD not included)

【Compatibility Reminder】Compatible with USB4 and Thunderbolt 3/4 hosts (Mac M1/M2 and Intel 12th generation or newer). Older Thunderbolt versions and some USB ports may not support full 40Gbps speed. Not fully compatible with SSD models such as Crucial P3 Plus, WD Black SN750, and Samsung 970 EVO Plus

name: USB4 M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD Enclosure 40Gbps, Designed for Always-on Mac mini Setups, Tool-Free, Dual-Sided Cooling, Thunderbolt 4/3 & USB4/3.2 Compatible, Fits M1/M2 M3/M4, Supports 2230/2242/2260/2280
short_description: 【Always-On Ready for Mac mini M4】 Engineered for continuous 24/7 operation, supporting long-running background tasks, automation workflows, and local desktop setups with stable performance and optimized airflow.
【40Gbps Lightning Speed】Achieve blazing-fast transfers up to 40Gbps (3000MB/s) with the NewQ USB4 M.2 NVMe SSD enclosure—perfect for large 4K/8K videos and demanding workloads.
【Advanced Dual-Side Cooling】Aircraft-grade aluminum casing and raised cooling fins ensure efficient heat dissipation for stable performance under heavy use.

【Fanless passive cooling technology】Why risk fans? After analyzing generations of ssd enclosures our team concluded that passive cooling is the future. Fans attract dust, generate noise, and reduce durability. Instead, our 40Gbps NVMe enclosure uses dual-side precision-engineered aluminum chassis to maximize airflow and dissipate heat efficiently—no moving parts, just silent reliability.

【Support Mac Dual-System Stability】This Thunderbolt 4 NVMe enclosure is tailor-made for Mac users, plug-and-play with macOS. Seamlessly install a secondary OS like Windows directly on your SSD —ideal for developers, designers, or cross-platform professionals. Rigorously tested for 40GBPS SSD enclosure stability making it the ultimate external SSD enclosure for dual-boot enthusiasts.
【Universal SSD Size Compatibility】Fits M.2 NVMe SSDs in 2230/2242/2260/2280 sizes. For peak performance, pair with a PCIe Gen4x4 SSD (M-Key recommended).
【Tool-Free Setup】No screws or tools needed—spring-loaded design enables quick SSD swaps. Silent, fanless operation for on-the-go professionals.
【Thunderbolt & USB4 Ready】Seamlessly works with MacBook Pro/Max M1/M2/M3/M4, Dell XPS, and other Thunderbolt 5/4/3/USB4 devices (Note: Some older Thunderbolt 3 laptops may have speed limits).

【Plug And Play】This M.2 NVMe Enclosure supports Mac devices and iPad Pro.Compatible with Windows, macOS and Linux. Just plug and play without a driver.Our NVMe Enclosure supports hot-swapping without affecting the rest of the server's capabilities.

【After-Sales Support】Should you encounter any quality issues, we’re happy to provide a replacement to ensure your satisfaction. Our goal is to make sure you have a positive experience with your product.

Tool-free Installation & Wide Compatibility: This versatile USB enclosure features a tool-free design. No screw or screwdriver needed, no additional driver required, plug and play. It's a convenient portable SSD enclosure that is perfectly suited for travel and business office use.

Plug and Play: This M.2 NVMe Enclosure supports M1 Pro/Max Mac devices and iPad Pro.Compatible with Windows, macOS and Linux. Just plug and play without a driver.Our NVMe Enclosure supports hot-swapping without affecting the rest of the server's capabilities.

Rugged, Silent & Reliable: The ACASIS SSD enclosure features a solid, fanless aluminum body with a curved surface. The design ensures effective passive cooling and exceptional durability.
